::Aerotaur::
     Aerotaur lands next to him and returns to his centaur mode.  He 
analyzes the signal for a moment and commits a copy of it to his 
memory.  "Hey, I can't even remember my name.  I have no idea that 
group that signal is from but I do have an idea."  He looks at the 
pod more closely.  "Alright here's what we do.  First we drag the pod 
into a clearing.  Then we should be able to make it transmit it's 
signal onver a long distance.  Then we can see who answers it."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
> Windlord had landed near a old metallic pod "Do you see this?"said 
> while he pointed at pod "I emerged from this thing, in my travels I 
> found more like this in all them the bot, inside was death; all of 
> them have the same signal... this one" he said while he pointed at 
a 
> signal"I don't sure what means this but... perhaps one of the 
> factions that were in these fight could have the same as it... I 
> don't sure... Can you remember this sing?"
